summary: This is a forwarded email from a US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) to an unspecified recipient, regarding Prince Andrew's claim that he has not been contacted by authorities. It includes an attachment and appears to be internal communication about the investigation.

persons.name: Andrew
persons.context: Prince Andrew is referenced as claiming he has not been approached or contacted by authorities, as mentioned in an internal email from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Internal email about Prince Andrew's claim
events.description: An email is forwarded within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding Prince Andrew's statement that he has not been contacted by authorities.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
It references Prince Andrew claiming he has not been approached or contacted by authorities.
The email includes an attachment (attachment_l.pdf) and another file (ATT00001.httn).
The communication is dated January 28, 2020, indicating ongoing investigation activity at that time.
